definition: a beam or timber that is propped against a structure to provide support, support by placing against something solid or rigid
details:
noun
- a beam or timber that is propped against a structure to provide support
= synonyms: shoring
- the land along the edge of a body of water
verb
- support by placing against something solid or rigid
= example: support by placing against something solid or rigid
= synonyms: prop
- arrive on shore
= synonyms: land
- serve as a shore to
= example: serve as a shore to
